H0.text: What is a mosquito-borne virus, also known as breakbone fever, that is an acute febrile disease which occurs widely in the tropics, in Asia, South America, Australia and the Pacific and is now endemic in more than 100 countries. Chikungunya

H1.text: What is a mosquito-borne virus, also known as breakbone fever, that is an acute febrile disease which occurs widely in the tropics, in Asia, South America, Australia and the Pacific and is now endemic in more than 100 countries. Zika

H2.text: What is a mosquito-borne virus, also known as breakbone fever, that is an acute febrile disease which occurs widely in the tropics, in Asia, South America, Australia and the Pacific and is now endemic in more than 100 countries. Yellow Fever

H3.text: What is a mosquito-borne virus, also known as breakbone fever, that is an acute febrile disease which occurs widely in the tropics, in Asia, South America, Australia and the Pacific and is now endemic in more than 100 countries. Dengay

A4.text: Chikungunya virus is transmitted by the bite of an infected mosquito of the genus Aedes, specifically Aedes aegypti and Aedes albopictus.

A5.text: As of December 2024, 119 countries and territories, principally those in tropical and subtropical regions, have reported local transmission of chikungunya.
